verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There's a cry inmy heart newline For your glory to fall newline For your Presence to fill up senses

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There is a yearning again newline A thirst for discipline newline A hunger for things that are deeper

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Could You take me beyond newline Could You carry me through newline If I open my heart newline Could I go there with you

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: For what do i have newline If i dont have you Jesus newline What in this life newline Could mean any more newline You are my rock newline You are my glory newline You are the lifter of my head

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Could You take me beyond newline Could You Carry me through newline If i open my heart newline Could i go there with you newline For I've been here before newline Yet i know there's still more newline Olord i need to know You
